column1: English wording: mindy had sustained winds of 35 mph as of 5 a.m. et . it is expected to move over the atlantic ocean and continue out to sea later thursday . the storm could drop 2 to 6 inches of rain in parts of southern georgia and coastal south carolina . a tornado or two is possible over portions of north florida and far south georgians . mindy formed in the gulf of mexico on wednesday morning .
